description: The service ends, which has been running for 22 years, as the teacher behind the project retires.
title: Isle of Man's schools computer bus service 'retires'
title_page: Isle of Man's schools computer bus service 'retires' - BBC News
maintext: Joel Smith, of the Department of Education, Sport and Culture, said it could be argued that the increase in mobile technology in schools, including the use of tablets, had led to the "idea of a bus that brings so many machines around different parts of the island [becoming] rather obsolete".
